summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Profit & Loss application. Backend APIs are highly functional (95% success rate) with robust authentication, CRUD operations, and analytics. Frontend has functional core features but suffers from runtime errors and modal overlay issues affecting user interactions.

minor_bugs.issue: Invalid login test timeout - likely network related

warnings.impact: Functionality not affected, just warning logs

critical_bugs.issue: Uncaught runtime errors displayed in red error overlay
critical_bugs.impact: Blocks user interactions and creates poor UX

critical_bugs.issue: Modal overlays blocking clicks on form elements
critical_bugs.impact: Users cannot interact with dropdowns and form elements properly

passed_tests: User registration with predefined categories (11 categories created)
Categories CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete)
Sales CRUD operations with payment methods
Reports with multiple filter types (week, month, quarter, year)
CSV import functionality for sales data
Dashboard charts rendering (Line, Bar, Pie charts)
Financial calculations (income, expenses, net profit, margin)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix frontend runtime errors causing red error overlay that blocks user interactions. Address modal overlay z-index issues preventing form interactions. The backend is solid (95% success rate) but frontend UX is significantly impacted by these overlay issues.
